section.7: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir bin 'Abdullah said:"The Messenger of Allah (S.A.W) moved until he came to Al-Muzdalifah, where he prayed Maghrib and 'Isha' with one Adhan and two Iqamahs, and he did not offer any prayer in between them
